history:
Welcome to RRTeCHGeo — a premier geospatial solutions company based in Bangalore, India, specializing in LiDAR processing, Scan-to-BIM, photogrammetry, orthophoto generation, GIS services, web development, and graphic design.

Since 2015, we’ve empowered organizations worldwide to turn complex geospatial data into clear, actionable insights that drive smarter decisions and real-world results.

We proudly serve industries including infrastructure, utilities, smart cities, mining, and environmental management, leveraging cutting-edge technology and workflows for maximum efficiency and accuracy.
mission: We transform spatial data into powerful visual stories that help you plan better, build smarter, and grow faster.
vision: To be the partner where geospatial intelligence meets innovation, and your vision finds its map.
team_summary: Our team of LiDAR specialists, Scan-to-BIM experts, photogrammetrists, GIS analysts, and creative designers is committed to precision, innovation, and excellence. From high-accuracy mapping, 3D modeling, and powerline classification to urban planning, environmental monitoring, and digital design solutions, we deliver reliable, scalable, and data-driven services tailored to your needs. At RRTechGeo, we don’t just process data — we bring geography to life.
